data.title: August 2010: [Frameworks] Emil cohl abd de de Chomón
data.text:
[Frameworks] Emil cohl abd de de Chomón

From: Chen Sheinberg (email suppressed)

Date: Sat Jul 17 2010 - 07:36:10 PDT

Dear frameworks,

does anybody know who distributes the films of Emil Cohl, Segundo de Chomón and also

Abel Gance's "La folie du Docteur Tube'' ?

Thanks

Chen Sheinberg

----- Original Message -----

From: Charles Chadwick

To: Experimental Film Discussion List

Sent: Saturday, July 17, 2010 6:56 AM

Subject: Re: [Frameworks] Short Film Show

Are you just taking films from new jersey filmmakers? If not, I'd like to submit something. Could you email me directly all that I need to know? (address, what materials you need, etc.) Thanks!

-Charles

Sent from my iPhone

On Jul 16, 2010, at 12:23 PM, Matt Helme <email suppressed> wrote:

I'll be organizing a another round of short film shows at the Old Bridge Public Library this September, if you have one to show that is 30 min or less and PG contact Matt Helme at email suppressed .

Thanks

Matt
